Description.Text: Facilities Guests can feel at home in one of the 86 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a dining area, a bar, room service, a conference room and a business centre. Wireless internet access is available to travellers. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. Rooms All rooms feature a mini fridge, a safe and WiFi. Special family rooms are available for families with children. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool is an enjoyable way to cool down on hot days. A range of options are available, including a gym and a spa. Additional services include an entertainment programme for children, offering numerous activities. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable.
